data.actual_result: The UI components take a few seconds to change, and it quite obvious if moving quickly
data.expected_result: The UI components should change theme immediately
data.short_description: Changing theme when using the back button delays UI theme update.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Settings > Appearance - Change the theme to the opposite colour - Press the back button (rather native or in-app) immediately - Observe how some UI components don't update: settings page and message flow take a few seconds.
